channel.title: Shooting the Moon (The Romance Trilogy)
channel.description:
*Shooting the Moon (The Romance Trilogy)* August 19 and 26 at 8 p.m. EDT / 5 p.m. PDT
![ShootingtheMoonCover2|300x453](upload://1oiCvpldi0d1dcwbzGvqhy5c1tJ.jpeg)
Two sessions of Emily Care Boss's *Shooting the Moon*: “Two Suitors compete for the affection of a shared Beloved, who has overwhelming odds of their own to face. United and divided by their shared fates and intertwined destinies, these characters discover what they are made of and what they will do for love.”
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiO971C9CkmuWPcc9-F): [date=2019-08-19 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-19 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
[Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LiO9KZMWFAP5pNHCms9): [date=2019-08-26 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-08-26 time=23:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]
